  $(document).ready(function () {

      , select: function (event, ui) {
        window.location = ui.item.id;

      $("#quicksearch .qs-area").addClass('with-autocompleter');
      $("#quicksearch #qs_dropdown_autocomplete").slideDown(0);
      var self = this;
      //this.css('width', '500');

      //$(ul).find('li').removeClass('ui-menu-item');
      //$(ul).css('width', '100%').css('position', "static");
    };
    autoc.data("autocomplete")._renderItem = function (ul, item) {
      return $("<li></li>")
      .data("item.autocomplete", item)
      .append("<a class='with-chevron' href='" + item.id + "'>" + item.label + "</a>")
      .appendTo(ul);
    };

    $('#quicksearch .phrase').blur(function () {
      if ($(this).parent().hasClass('with-dropdown') == 1) {
        setTimeout("$('#qs_dropdown_default').slideUp(slideTime)", slideTime / 2);
        $(this).parent().removeClass("with-dropdown");
      } else if ($(this).parent().hasClass('with-autocompleter') == 1) {
        $(this).parent().removeClass("with-autocompleter");
        setTimeout("$('#qs_dropdown_autocomplete').slideUp(slideTime)", slideTime / 2);
      }
    });
    $('#quicksearch .phrase').focus(function () {
      if (($(this).attr('value').length < 3) && ($(this).parent().hasClass('with-dropdown') != 1)) {
        $('#qs_dropdown_default').slideDown(slideTime);
        $(this).parent().addClass('with-dropdown');
      }
    });

    $('#quicksearch .phrase').keyup(function () {
      if ($(this).attr('value').length < 3) {
        if ($(this).parent().hasClass('with-dropdown') != 1) {
          $('#qs_dropdown_default').slideDown(slideTime);
          $(this).parent().addClass('with-dropdown');
        }
        if ($(this).parent().hasClass('with-autocompleter') == 1) {
          $('#qs_dropdown_autocomplete').slideUp(slideTime);
          $(this).parent().removeClass('with-autocompleter');
        }
      } else if ($(this).attr('value').length >= 3) {
        if ($(this).parent().hasClass('with-dropdown') == 1) {
          $('#qs_dropdown_default').slideUp(slideTime);
          $(this).parent().removeClass('with-dropdown');

        if ($(this).parent().hasClass('with-autocompleter') != 1) {
        }

<script type="text/javascript" src="/Templates/SitePPL/Scripts/jquery/jquery.cookie.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/Templates/SitePPL/Scripts/jquery/jquery.simple-cookie-notice.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  $(document).ready(function () {

    $.fn.simpleCookieNotice({
      setImpDate: 'March 14, 2013',
      setURL: /http:\/\/www\.ppluk\.com/,
      cookiePageURL: '/Additional-Pages/Privacy-Policy/',
      fadeInTime: 1500, showTime: 10000, fadeOutTime: 2500,
      cookieText: 'We use cookies. Learn more, '
    });

    var businessType = 0;
    if ( businessType > 0) 
    {
      $("a.button:contains('Apply for licence'), .submodule a[href*='Apply-for-licence']").attr('href', function(i, href) { return href + '?bt=0'; });
    };

    $("#main_column_modules p, #right_column_modules p").filter(function () { return $.trim($(this).html()) == ''; }).remove();

    $('.DatepickerInput').datepicker({ dateFormat: 'dd/mm/yy' });

    $('.print-btn').on('click', function(e) { e.stopPropagation(); window.print(); return false;});

    $(".tab-header-list li").click(function () {
      var ind = $(this).index(); var tl = $(this).parent().next('.tab-list');
      if (tl && !$(this).hasClass('current-tab-header')) {
        $('li', $(this).parent()).removeClass('current-tab-header'); $(this).addClass('current-tab-header');
        $('.tab', tl).removeClass('current-tab'); $(".tab:eq(" + $(this).index() + ")", tl).addClass('current-tab');
      }
    });
    $("#StageArea").delegate('.tooltip-mark', 'hover', function () { $('.tooltip-text', this).toggle() }, function () { $('.tooltip-text', this).toggle() });
    //function () { $('.tooltip-text', this).css('top', (-1 * $('.tooltip-text', this).height() / 3) + 'px').toggle() },

    $('.tab-titles li').click(function () {
      var ind = $(this).index(); var tc = $(this).parent().next('.tab-content');
      $(this).parent().find('li.tab:not(' + ind + ')').removeClass('tab-current');
      $(this).addClass('tab-current');
      tc.find('li.tab:not(' + ind + ')').removeClass('tab-current');
      tc.find('li.tab:eq(' + ind + ')').addClass('tab-current');
    });
    $('.tab-titles li:eq(0)').click();
    setTimeout("$('.tab-titles li:eq(0)').click()", 100);
    $('.tab-titles li').hover(function () { $(this).addClass('tab-rollover'); }, function () { $(this).removeClass('tab-rollover'); });

    $(".home-module .tabs td").hover(
      function () { $(this).parents('table').find('td').removeClass('current'); $(this).addClass('current') },
      function () { } //$(this).parent().removeClass('current') }
    );
    $(".home-module .tabs").each(function () { $(this).find('td:eq(0)').addClass('current'); });
    $(".table-module").find("tr:first").addClass('first');
    $(".table-module").find("tr:last").addClass('last');
    $(".table-module table .tooltip").each(function () { $(this).replaceWith('<div class="tooltip-mark rollover"><div class="tooltip-text"><div class="top"></div><div class="copy">' + $(this).html() + '</div><div class="bottom"></div></div>'); });
    $(".music-suppliers-list td img").each(function () {
      var link = $(this).parents('td').find('a[href^="http://"]:last');
      link.addClass('with-chevron');
      var img = $('<div>').append($(this).clone()).remove().html();
      $(this).replaceWith('<a href="' + link.attr('href') + '">' + img + '</a>');
    });

    $('.with-xform .xForm fieldset').find('input[type=checkbox][class!=""]:eq(0)').each(function () {
      $(this).parent().addClass($(this).attr('class'));
    });
    $(".invoice-page-switch a").click(function () {
      $(".invoice-page-switch a").toggleClass("inactive");
      $(".invoice-pages .invoice-page").toggleClass("current");
      return false;
    });

    $("#main_nav ul li.top-level:eq(0)").addClass('play');
    $("#main_nav ul li.top-level:eq(1)").addClass('make');
    $("#main_nav ul li.top-level:eq(2)").addClass('about');

    $("#main_nav ul.level-2").find("li:first").addClass('first');
    $("#main_nav ul.level-2").find("li:last").addClass('last');

    $(".home-module .tabs").find("tr:first").addClass('first');
    $(".home-module .tabs").find("tr:last").addClass('last');
    $(".list-only ul ").find(">li:first").addClass('first');
    $(".list-only ul ").find(">li:last").addClass('last');
    $(".accordion-list").find(">ul>li:first").addClass('first');
    $(".accordion-list").find(">ul>li:last").addClass('last');

    $(".accordion-list li li img").parent().parent().parent().append('<div class="clearfix"></div>');
    $(".listing-pager a[disabled]").addClass('btn-disabled');
    $("#main_nav ul li.top-level").hover(function () { $(this).addClass('dropdown'); }, function () { $(this).removeClass('dropdown'); });
    //$('.play').addClass('dropdown');

    $("#main_nav ul.level-2 li, .home-module .tabs tr").hover(function () {
      $(this).addClass('current');
      $(this).parents('.top-level').find('.top-tab-content').addClass('top-tab-content-hidden');
      var dropdown = $(this).parents('.dropdown');
      dropdown.find('.bottom').removeClass('bottom-white');
      dropdown.find('.top').removeClass('top-white');
      if ($(this).hasClass('first')) {
        dropdown.find('.top').addClass('top-white');
      }
      if ($(this).hasClass('last')) {
        dropdown.find('.bottom').addClass('bottom-white');
      }
    }, function () {
      $(this).removeClass('current');
      $(this).parents('.top-level').find('.top-tab-content').removeClass('top-tab-content-hidden');
      var dropdown = $(this).parents('.dropdown');
      if ($(this).parents('#main_nav').is('div')) {
        dropdown.find('.bottom').removeClass('bottom-white');
        dropdown.find('.top').removeClass('top-white');
      }
    });

    //ga event tracking
    var filetypes = /\.(zip|exe|pdf|doc*|xls*|ppt*|mp3)$/i;
    var baseHref = '';
    if (jQuery('base').attr('href') != undefined)
      baseHref = jQuery('base').attr('href');
    jQuery('a').each(function () {
      var href = jQuery(this).attr('href');
      if (href && (href.match(/^https?\:/i)) && (!href.match(document.domain))) {
        jQuery(this).click(function () {
          var extLink = href.replace(/^https?\:\/\//i, '');
          _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'External', 'Click', extLink]);
          if (jQuery(this).attr('target') != undefined && jQuery(this).attr('target').toLowerCase() != '_blank' && !jQuery(this).hasClass('in-new-window')) {
            setTimeout(function () { location.href = href; }, 200);
            return false;
          }
        });
      }
      else if (href && href.match(/^mailto\:/i)) {
        jQuery(this).click(function () {
          var mailLink = href.replace(/^mailto\:/i, '');
          _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Email', 'Click', mailLink]);
        });
      }
      else if (href && href.match(filetypes)) {
        jQuery(this).click(function () {
          var extension = (/[.]/.exec(href)) ? /[^.]+$/.exec(href) : undefined;
          var filePath = href;
          //console.log("_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Download', 'Click-' + " + extension + ", " + filePath + "]);");
          _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Download', 'Click-' + extension, filePath]);
          if (jQuery(this).attr('target') != undefined && jQuery(this).attr('target').toLowerCase() != '_blank') {
            setTimeout(function () { location.href = baseHref + href; }, 200);
            return false;
          }
        });
      }
    });

    if (document.referrer.match(/google\./gi) && document.referrer.match(/cd/gi)) {
      var myString = document.referrer;
      var r        = myString.match(/cd=(.*?)&/);
      var rank     = parseInt(r[1]);
      var kw       = myString.match(/q=(.*?)&/);

      if (kw[1].length > 0) {
        var keyWord  = decodeURI(kw[1]);
      } else {
        keyWord = "(not provided)";
      }

      var p        = document.location.pathname;
      _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'RankTracker', keyWord, p, rank, true]);
    }

    $('.home-module .dropdown .top').addClass('top-white');

    $("#StageArea").delegate(".rollover", "mouseover", function () { $(this).css('background-image', $(this).css('background-image').replace('.png', '_over.png')); });
    $("#StageArea").delegate(".rollover", "mouseout", function () { $(this).css('background-image', $(this).css('background-image').replace('_over.png', '.png')); });

    $("#MainColumnArea a.with-icon").each(function () {
      $(this).addClass('icon-' + $(this).attr('href').substr($(this).attr('href').length - 3).toLowerCase());
    });
    $("#MainColumnArea .icon-contact").each(function () {
      $(this).addClass(($(this).attr('nodeName') == 'A') ? 'icon-email' : 'icon-phone');
    });

    $("#MainColumnArea .tick-list-oneline").each(function () {
      $(this).prev('p').css('float', 'left');
    });
    $('#MainColumnArea .accordion').each(function () {
      var max = $('.item-count', this).html();
      if ($('.accordion-list', this).find('>ul>li').size() > max) {
        $('.accordion-list', this).find('>ul>li:gt(' + (max - 1) + ')').addClass('expanded-only');
        $('.accordion-more-less', this).toggle();
      } else {
        $('.accordion-list', this).addClass('accordion-without-expanded');
      }
    });

    $('#MainColumnArea .accordion ul li').click(function () { $(this).toggleClass('expanded'); $('li', this).slideToggle(); });
    $('#MainColumnArea .accordion ul li li').click(function (e) { e.stopPropagation(); });

    $('#MainColumnArea .accordion-more-less').click(function () {
      $(this).parent().parent().find('.expanded-only').toggle();
      var oldLabel = $('span', this).html();
      $('span', this).html($(this).attr('title')); $(this).attr('title', oldLabel);
      return false;
    });
    $('a[href^="http://"], a[href^="https://"]').filter(function () { return !$(this).hasClass('banner-sw') }).addClass('in-new-window');
    $('a.in-new-window').click(function (e) { window.open($(this).attr('href')); e.preventDefault(); return false; });
    $('a[href^="https://careers"], a[href^="https://pplebso"]').addClass('tracked-link-through');
    //$('a.tracked-link-through').each(function () { console.log($(this).attr('href'));  $(this).attr('onclick', "_gaq.push(['_link', " + $(this).attr('href') + "]); return false;"); });
    $('a.tracked-link-through').click(function () { _gaq.push(['_link', $(this).attr('href')]); return false; });

    $('#main_column_modules p:eq(0)'/*, #right_column_modules p:eq(0)*/).addClass('first');

    $('.select .select-submit').click(function () {
      var action = ($(this).attr('href').length < 2) ? $(this).prev().attr('value') : $(this).attr('href');
      if (action != '') {
        $('form:eq(0)').attr('action', action).submit();
      } else {
        window.alert("Please select an option");
      }
      return false;
    });

  });

  function NotValidated() {
    $(".xformvalidator").filter(function () { return (($(this).css('visibility') != 'hidden') && ($(this).css('display') != 'none')) == false; }).parents('td').removeClass("has-error");
    $(".xformvalidator").filter(function () { return (($(this).css('visibility') != 'hidden') && ($(this).css('display') != 'none')) == true; }).parents('td').addClass("has-error");
  }

  $(document).ready(function () {

    NotValidated();

    $('.xForm').delegate('input, select', 'blur', function () {
      var row = $(this).parents('tr');
      var hasError = (row.find('.xformvalidator').filter(function () { return ($(this).css("visibility") == "visible"); }).length > 0);
      if (hasError) { row.addClass('has-error'); } else { row.removeClass('has-error'); }
    });
  });

  function submitToNew(sender, action) {
    $('form:eq(0)').attr('action', action).attr('target', 'myPPL').submit();
  }

  var isiPad = navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i) != null;
  if (isiPad) {
  $('#right_column_modules').find(
    '.button[href$="/I-Make-Music/Understanding-Your-Payments/When-will-I-get-paid/"], ' +
    '.button[href^="/Documents/PPL%20comments,"], ' +
    '.button[href^="http://web2.ppluk.com/vpl/"], ' +
    '.button[href$="/About-Us/Who-We-Are/Annual-Reports/"],' +
    '.button[href$="/I-Make-Music/Understanding-Your-Payments/How-can-I-earn-more/"], ' +
    '.button[href$="/I-Play-Music/Businesses/Apply-for-licence-business/"], ' +
    '.button[href$="/I-Make-Music/Understanding-Your-Payments/Member-FAQs/"] ' +

  '').css('padding-right', '14px');
  $('#main_column_modules').find(
    '.accordion .accordion-more-less, ' +
    '.button[href$="/I-Play-Music/Television-Broadcasting/"], ' +
    '.button[href$="/I-Play-Music/Businesses/Why-is-music-good-for-business/"], ' +
    '.button[href$="/I-Play-Music/Businesses/Apply-for-licence-business/"], ' +
    '.button[href^="http://www.pplvideostore.com/"], ' +
    '.button[href$="https://myppl.ppluk.com"] ' +
  '').css('padding-right', '14px');
  $('.bottom-modules .module:not(:eq(0)) .body').find(
    '.button[href$="/About-Us/What-We-Do/"] ' +
  '').css('padding-right', '14px');
  $('.carousel-container .carousel').find(
    '.button[href$="/About-Us/"] ' +
  '').css('padding-right', '14px');
  $('.tab-titles li.first').css('padding-right', '14px');
  };
</script>

</body><link href="/Templates/SitePPL/scripts/pgwmodal.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<script src="/Templates/SitePPL/scripts/pgwmodal.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var linkMaintenance = {
        fragment: '/About-Us/News/Press/Scottish-hit-parade-revealed/',
    alert: $('<div id="maintenance-info" style="display: none;"></div>').html('<h1>myPPL maintenance</h1><p>Sorry, myPPL is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance. We apologise  for any inconvenience this may cause, please try again later.</p>'),
        start: new Date('1/26/2015 11:30:00 AM'),
        end: new Date('1/28/2015 3:30:00 PM'),
        now: new Date()
    }

    $(document).ready(function () {        
        var $title = linkMaintenance.alert.find('h1');
        var $text = linkMaintenance.alert.find('p');

    if (linkMaintenance.fragment.length > 3) {
      $('a[href*="' + linkMaintenance.fragment + '"]').unbind('click').click(function(event) { 
        linkMaintenance.now = new Date();
        if (linkMaintenance.start <= linkMaintenance.now && linkMaintenance.end > linkMaintenance.now) {
          $('body').remove('#maintenance-info').append(linkMaintenance.alert);

          $.pgwModal({
            title: $title.length ? $title.text() : 'Maintenance',
            target: '#maintenance-info',
            maxWidth: 400
          });

          event.preventDefault();
          event.stopPropagation();
          return false;
        }
      })

      $(document).bind('PgwModal::Close', function() {
        $('body').remove('#maintenance-info');
      });
    }
    });
</script>
